content:
Zynx Health is pleased to announce a two-phase (concept and prototype) Innovation Challenge Contest. How might we enhance the delivery of patient care and reduce clinical and financial variation?

Innovation Challenge: http://www.zynxhealth.com/news-resources/developer/developerchallenge/

Part of the challenge is using the Zynx Health API and FHIR? The Zynx Health API provides access to Zynx Content in the FHIR standard PlanDefinition resource format. View our API quick-start documentation for more details.

API Key Request: http://www.zynxhealth.com/news-resources/developer/

Developer Documentation: https://github.com/zynxhealth/documentation/blob/master/README.md

Sincerely, Your friendly FHIR enthusiast,

Aslan Brooke
Director, Technology, Security Officer
Zynx Health â€¢ Part of the Hearst Health Network
